My Squiffy games do that periodically. It sucks. I try to back them up regularly, except when I forget... Some days, when I go to open them for editing, they are just blank documents. I don't know if they are deleting themselves when I open them, so I stop opening them for a while in the hopes that it will help prevent more of them from magically deleting themselves.

I really hope you find a solution soon. I need it too. All of my work disappeared today, and my backup is hopelessly out of date. Start over from scratch? Even my notes were in Squiffy.

It sucks.

If you are on a mobile device and have no Notpad++, you could set up a free GitHub account and work from a Gist.

You can even load your Gist into Scratchpad to test it easily before going through all the trouble of copying and pasting:

http://docs.textadventures.co.uk/squiffy/scratchpad/
